snippet.title: Men of War II — The Price of Victory Trailer
snippet.description:
Eagerly awaited by many players and strategy game enthusiasts, the upcoming sequel to the acclaimed RTS franchise Men of War II will launch in 2023. The decision to reschedule the original 2022 release date was made in order to accommodate new features and content suggested by its fans and improve the game itself, which would not be possible due to delays caused by the war in Ukraine.

Coming on PC - Wishlist NOW!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1128860/Men_of_War_II/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/men-of-war-ii-171a7e

Join the Men of War II official discord: https://discord.gg/VszFwDPKTy

Follow Fulqrum Publishing on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/FulqrumPublishing
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FulqrumPublishing
Website: http://www.FulqrumPublishing.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FulqrumPublishing/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FulqrumPub
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FulqrumPublishing/
VK: https://vk.com/fulqrumpublishing

#RTS #MenofWarII #MenofWar
